companyInfo.name: Global Fresh SA

companyInfo.description: Specializing in premium dried fruits and nuts that showcase South Africa's unique flavors and agricultural heritage.

team.name: Thandi Nkosi
team.background: Background in agricultural development with years working with farming communities in the Western Cape
team.description: Thandi oversees our company vision and growth strategy. With a background in agricultural development and a passion for creating sustainable food systems, she ensures we maintain strong relationships with our farming partners.

team.name: Sean King
team.background: Food technologist with experience at leading South African food companies
team.description: Sean manages our day-to-day operations and product development. With his food technology background and previous experience at major food producers, he ensures our products meet the highest quality standards.

team.name: Hendrik Venter
team.background: 25 years in the food export sector
team.description: Hendrik joined our board in 2021, bringing valuable experience from his 25 years in the food export sector. He advises on our growth strategy and international expansion plans.

blogPosts.title: Global Fresh SA Exploring Export Opportunities
blogPosts.content: We're excited to announce that Global Fresh SA is exploring opportunities to export our products to neighboring countries. After receiving interest from distributors in Namibia and Botswana, we're currently researching the requirements for taking our uniquely South African products to new markets.

blogPosts.title: New Product Launch: Superfood Berry Mix
blogPosts.content: This month, we're delighted to introduce the newest addition to our Cape Harvest range: Superfood Berry Mix. This nutrient-packed blend features goji berries, cranberries, mulberries, and golden berries, offering a perfect balance of sweet and tart flavors along with exceptional health benefits.

blogPosts.title: Global Fresh SA Products Now at Select Woolworths Stores
blogPosts.content: We're proud to announce that Global Fresh SA products are now available at select Woolworths stores across the Western Cape and Gauteng. This exciting development marks a significant milestone in our growth journey since founding the company in 2018.

initiatives.name: Packaging
initiatives.description: Transitioning to fully compostable packaging across our product range by the end of 2024

initiatives.name: Waste Reduction
initiatives.description: Production processes achieve 82% utilization of raw materials, with fruit byproducts donated to local composting programs

initiatives.name: Local Sourcing
initiatives.description: Work with small-scale farmers within 200km of our facility wherever possible, reducing transport emissions and supporting local agriculture
